info.name: R3gi's JIRA Dark
info.additionalInfo:
Dark UI theme for JIRA
Author: R3gi, Czech Republic, based heavily on style Jira Cloud Dark Flat by David Bronke (https://userstyles.org/styles/154221/jira-cloud-dark-flat)

Designed to be pleasing for eyes during the whole day!

Feel free to report issues and unthemed elements, so as all sites you wanna include.

If you find it useful, don't be afraid to leave a comment or you can by me a beer ;-)

Enjoy!

data.title: Best JIRA style, just missing theming on code snippets
Color of HTML Links in Task Descriptions/Comments
